Aprende con Pokemon: Aventura Entre Las Teclas
name: Learn with Pokémon: Typing Adventure
overview: Battle & Get! Pokémon Typing DS is a spin-off Pokémon game designed to teach players how to type. It is sold with a Bluetooth-enabled QWERTY keyboard that communicates with the DS, but there is also a touch-screen keyboard available
